Per-Event Interrupt Enable Register

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x8
Size:
0x4

Description

Dedicated register with one bit for each event that may produce an interrupt.

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:1] - - - -
[0] notif_cmd_done_en rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

notif_cmd_done_en

Enable bit for Command Done
